D

Dealer - Class in com.wove
class to represent the dealer in Blackjack
Dealer(List<Player>) - Constructor for class com.wove.Dealer
creates a new instance of a dealer who has a reference to each player
dealer - Variable in class com.wove.GameController
representation of the dealer at a blackjack table
DEALER_STAND_RULE_STRING - Static variable in class com.wove.CasinoRules
 
dealerDraws() - Method in class com.wove.GameController
Has the dealer draw his cards one by one updating the screen each time
dealerHasBlackjack() - Static method in class com.wove.UserIO
tells the users that the dealer has black jack and asks if the users would like to play again
dealerHitPolicy(Hand) - Static method in class com.wove.CasinoRules
Determines when the dealer must hit
deck - Variable in class com.wove.Dealer
the deck of cards.
Deck - Class in com.wove
class representing the deck of all cards used by the dealer.
Deck() - Constructor for class com.wove.Deck

doneHandingOutCards() - Method in class com.wove.Dealer
